website_summaries.verdict: A pouch option with flavors and a stew consistency picky cats love, with natural ingredients cats need.
pros: Free of most additives and common allergens like grains
Brand is environmentally conscious and family owned
Lots of flavors cats love – most fish, some with pumpkin which aids digestion
cons: Some found the consistency too watery
Pouches can be messy, hard to get all the contents out

website_summaries.verdict: Perfect option for older cats that struggle with chewing dry food. Almost a liquid consistency in the pouch.
pros: Customers say their cats love the smell, taste, and texture of this wet food
High protein formula contains very little fat and no grain
Food's formula helps with the health and strength of the cat's coat
cons: Removing soft food from pouch can be very messy
Some customers don't like the smell

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't love it, but my cat sure does. He's picky at 20 and has trouble with solids. Dry food is a memory. This is largely gravy but seems substantial, and the thing is he hoovers it up. Found it at a local place; Amazon has it. I'd say mix it up with another acceptable alternative, the protein might be an issue with some cats. 4 months now and he is still hoovering. Going for 21.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: I add water, see pictures
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. I put about a tablespoon of water to remove the left over food in the pouch before i serve it because my cat loves the extra gravy and it adds more liquid to her diet. First picture is the food as it comes, second picture is the food with added water.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea why this is sold as "cat food". About 20 cats (my 2 indoors and the rest outdoor strays) said it's not.
customer_reviews.text: If there was a minus 5 stars that is what I would give it. I don't even know where to begin.when it comes to this food. My two cats are both gravy lovers. They won't even touch cat pate style food. But this is not gravy. This is some kind of soup in which float 2-3 pieces of unidentified substance. Both my cats deemed it "not food" after sniffing it for a total of 10 seconds (if that). I took it out to the outdoors cats living around my house. Some are tame, some are feral. It's 24 hours later, the dish is still untouched. The outdoors cats ate clean the cheapo Meow Mix I give them. Conclusion: wasted money,
customer_reviews.author: Doina "Day" Berndt dba Kalyana Design

customer_reviews.title: change of formula
customer_reviews.text: For years I fed my cats (two) BFF food pouches without a problem. Because of their age (16), the cats preferred the soft texture of the cat pouch food. Weruva BFF has now changed the formula causing the cat food to be inedible to my cats. What happened? Cat owners should be alerted; not only hasi the packaging changed, but also the formula.
customer_reviews.author: montaigne

customer_reviews.title: True gravy-like food, no chunks, picky cats live it and is dolphin safe and recyclable
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that are very picky eaters. They love gravy food but hate any chunks and I got tired of wasting bowls that were still full of food but that had all the gravy licked dry from the bits! They love this food (tuna/salmon and tuna/chicken). It’s all thick gravy with no real noticeable chunks. They have even rejected other so-called “broths” or “bisques” because they didn’t like the thin flakes of chicken or fish. They gobble this stuff up and lick the bowl clean. Price is good and pouches are recyclable through terracycle. I like that it’s also labeled dolphin safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: Best cat food since Whiska's Mealtime
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't touch most cat foods, this one is almost all gravy with lots of small (unnoticeable) meat... they don't know they're getting a meal, they think they stumbled upon the pot of gravy at the end of the rainbow. I've searched almost a decade for a cat food that my cats liked as well as Whiska's Mealtime (the most irresistible wet food in America - they don't make it anymore). Great stuff, lousy packaging, I've never not squeezed a splash trying to open the Fort Knox pouch.
customer_reviews.author: COLLEEN A LYTLE

customer_reviews.title: Bad Food
customer_reviews.text: These came without the box wrapped in a plastic bag. Im not sure where they came from but they made my cat very sick. She threw it all up. Ive been using this brand for a long time and she never had that reaction. The other orders i received came in the original box and she has had no problem. These also smelled really strong and off somehow. Not happy. Again no original box. Where did they come from??
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: It's garbage
customer_reviews.text: I guess I fell for the OMG BFF label. I bought a tuna salmon blend ... Be forewarned - when you open the package it's obvious the contents are made the stinkiest part of the fish that is typically thrown out. It's also watered down (they call it a 'gravy'. It's truly a sin this stuff is being packaged to feed our pets. Don't waste your money on this - there are many other much higher quality pet foods out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat wont touch this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Weruva's Cats in the Kitchen, variety pack so I thought she would love Weruva's B.F.F., variety pack just the same. NO, she looks at her bowl, sniffs and walks away, she is not interested at all! The pouches are gross to pour out and look like something already partially digested. Wish I could have returned this...
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C.

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS - Made My Cat Sick!
customer_reviews.text: At first my cat loved a pouch of this stuff once a day, so I bought a second box. Not sure if the second box was contaminated but she has had diarrhea and vomiting for days. I'm taking her to the vet and NEVER buying this brand again. I read online they had recalls in Australia and elsewhere, not just for digestive issues but for high levels of mercury, etc. Cats have DIED eating this stuff so please find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Marston

customer_reviews.title: My Outdoor Cat Loves This Brand!
customer_reviews.text: My male cat loves this formula, and cleans his bowl when I serve it. It is just the healthy variety of wet food I have been searching for. He is an indoor/outdoor cat and I like to give him food that is as close to what he would find in the wild, to discourage him from hunting all the time. I have tried many other grain-free varieties and he leaves food in the bowl every time with the others. A happy cat is a happy owner!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyRow

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved all the flavors in the assorted pack and ate it up so quick! I plan on continuing to feed him this food because it also worked for his digestion. He has a sensitive stomach and any changes in food usually give him an upset tummy (could be IBS) but this food worked great and didn't bother him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaya Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have very picky eaters, but I split a pouch between my 3 cats every morning as a treat, and all 3 love this stuff. I see in some reviews people can't get it all out of the pouch. I use a spoon and scoop it all out, no problems. It's a little pricey, I wouldn't replace it as their normal diet, but as a treat, I approve, or if your kitty isn't feeling well and needs to eat a healthy wet food, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Starry Night

customer_reviews.title: My cat, strays and raccoons refuse to eat it
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely refuses to eat this food!! Every package I opened it looked exactly the same there is ZERO COLOR OR SMELL differences between the different kinds. No matter what I did he refused it. So I am stuck with a cat food not being used. The stray cants and raccoons won’t even eat it?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bone

customer_reviews.title: Older cat thrives on this food!
customer_reviews.text: We have a ten year old male cat who has megacolon and other digestive issues. We have found a huge difference in him when he eats this cat food versus the cheaper stuff (like Friskies wet food). Really though, this food isn't that expensive compared to the cheaper stuff and well worth the value. His coat is shinier, his mood is better, his fur is fluffier, his dandruff goes away. He licks the bowl clean. We will definitely keep buying this cat food.
customer_reviews.author: S Mc Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Big love for this product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a sensitive stomach and I have her on a limited ingredient dry food. I love that this is grain-free and she bugs us until we feed her this food. I give her 1/2 of a pouch in the morning and the other 1/2 at dinner. She loves, loves, loves the tuna-based flavors and even eats most of the tid-bit chunks. She loves the gravy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product & good value, but packaging falls short
customer_reviews.text: Our cat really likes this food and we have been using several flavors for a long time. However, the shipping packaging has become questionable. In the past, we've received this product packed in cardboard boxes, but the last two came in bubble mailing envelopes and the box of food packets inside was destroyed. Badly enough I'm concerned that the packets could be smashed enough to rupture in a future order, and at the least I now can't use the product box for storage. A corner cut too much in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Particular

customer_reviews.title: our cat is no longer hungry all the time
customer_reviews.text: we switch from mixture of dry and wet can food to b.f.f. pouch for our 2yr male cat. he usually meows when he's hungry and meows for more food right after he finished eating. after reading about dry vs wet food and what not, we gave a to b.f.f. pouch a try. first time we fed him this food, he no longer meows after eating, like he's actually satisfied and full from eating. now we feed him less, twice a day, instead of 3 times a day and he's no longer hungry all the time. vet has told us he's at the right weight and shouldn't get any heavier. we'll stick with this brand for a while.
customer_reviews.author: hf

customer_reviews.title: Myeh
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely soupy, like liquidized cat food. The cats love it, but it also seems to give one of them diarhea. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Its terrific. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand that all 3 cats can agree on. They cuddle next to the box at night. I tried some of the tuna and lamb just to see. It tastes like every other cat food to me. But the cats love it. Wish they offered full boxes of just 1 flavor instead of the mix. Cheaper than the pet stores around here.
customer_reviews.author: Tomagain

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you can stand it
customer_reviews.text: HUGE amount in each package - easy to share among several cats if used as a reward or treat. As a PERSON: Surprisingly chunky, and not always in a good way since I was expecting something smoother. Looked just awful and was kind of hard to clean up if it wasn't all eaten. And the SMELL, my goodness, you will NOT wonder if there's any out. Cat's Reviews One of my cats loved it, another would some as long as there was no beef in it, and the third wouldn't touch it. I recommend buying a single pouch first to test it out before committing. But for the price, the bulk pack here was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holewa

customer_reviews.title: Penny loves this food! And it’s really good for her!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! My cat is OBSESSED, and she’s picky AF... will even skip tuna if she’s in a mood! She sits by her food bowl throughout the day in hopes I will feed her. This is new behavior! Penny says it’s tasty, high quality cat food. Also, the food packets are no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: T&L

customer_reviews.title: It looked like great food but my picky cat friend wouldn't eat it ><
customer_reviews.text: I bought this food as a treat for my cat, Sir Pounce-A-Lot, because he likes food with gravy. I'd heard and read that Weruva is made with really good ingredients so I decided to splurge. My cat friend had other ideas. He turned up his nose at this food and I gave it away to someone else (who's cat, I'm told, really liked it) hence, I'm still going to give it four stars--one star off because it's packaged in plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: My old man cat sometimes doesn’t want to eat kibble, so we have been trying different pouches of cat fud. This one has the best ingredients and a generous portion. The cats love it. And the packaging is a lot of win.
customer_reviews.author: anna swiniarska

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: This smells and looks unpleasant (probably not worse than any wet cat food) and is killing the environment with the packaging, but my finicky 16 year old cat loves it so I don't have much choice. I wish it was a true gravy as she doesn't eat the chunks but it is as close as I have been able to find. As she doesn't eat the chunks, I see them and shape of some of them are weird but there are also shredded meat pieces so it seems to be decent quality (and advertises as such).
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Met With Old Cat Approval!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are absolutely in love with this product (all flavors). They happily rush to the bowl anytime I feed them one of these pouches and being that they are now senior citizens (11 years), they don't eat as much dry food and refuse to eat any wet food that isn't covered in gravy and is mostly in bisque form. So as they've gotten older, I've been trying to find healthier grain free options for them to manage their weight and ensure they're getting the best nutrition I can give them and these seem to do the trick. They definitely appreciate this food and it has replaced another popular bisque brand I used to buy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Piccolina gave this food a thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that our cat is very very picky. She loves dry food, but when it comes to wet food she only likes bisques and gravies. We decided to give this one a try because she was getting tired of her regular brand. Unfortunately, she did not like this at all. We bought the variety pack, and there was not one flavor that appealed to her. It didn't go to waste, as my mom fed some of the outdoor strays and they seemed to have no complaints, but as for our little princess, it was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Liv D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells nasty, cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the first envelope of this stuff I nearly gagged but when my cats smelled it, they immediately started chowing down. I'm still trying to settle on the least nasty way to open the pouches, but it's worth the mess to see my cats consume every bite.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixx

customer_reviews.title: Great for Picky Cats
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful limited ingredient product. I have one cat that has a chicken allergy and is extremely picky. This brand has multiple flavors with no chicken in them. Also, this stuff is the stinkiest food ever. But the cats LOVE that. LOL. Will continue to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Requested Daily
customer_reviews.text: Split a packet between our 2 girlz each morning and evening. They enjoy so much that they'll remind us if late! That's a 100% positive testimonial in our household. Also like what the Weruva company stands for and that they donate to rescue organizations feeding homeless kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Pa_tricia Shoppes💅

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky older cat who turns her nose up at most food or just licks out the gravy and leaves the food. This is one food I keep on my rotation as she eats almost the whole serving every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself, buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My boys get this stuff daily at 1730. They will quit literally nag us from 1700 on because their internal clocks tell them it’s ‘gravy time’. I don’t know what would happen to us if we couldn’t get this anymore, maybe they’d go after our red gravy....
customer_reviews.author: Skeletonkey IFOR

customer_reviews.title: Better food for your cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has digestive issues but this food seems to help him. He tends to just lap at food and leave large pieces of meat so I blend this up into a cat soup with a tiny bit of water and he loves it. Try that if you have older cat you want to feed good quality food.
customer_reviews.author: A. Summers

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS INCONSISTENT
customer_reviews.text: MY CATS USUALLY LOVE THIS---BUT THEY WON'T TOUCH THIS BATCH--I TRIED SEVERAL TIMES--ALK 9 CATS SAID ---ICK---NO THANKS! ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Fl. lady

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves B.F.F., guardian is super annoyed with packaging
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat loves this product, any flavor, so I'd typically give the product 5*. My issue is the packaging. I realize the design allows the packet to stand upright, but It is extremely difficult to get the entire contents out of the poorly designed packet. I have to cut it open with scissors and use a utensil to scrape out the last of the product--which is no small amount--trapped in the bottom crevices of the packet. It annoys me no end and I wouldn't purchase this brand again if my cat didn't love the gravy mix so much. (The typical B.F.F. canned food is too dense for her to eat.)
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves B.F.F., guardian is super annoyed with packaging
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat loves this product, any flavor, so I'd typically give the product 5*. My issue is the packaging. I realize the design allows the packet to stand upright, but It is extremely difficult to get the entire contents out of the poorly designed packet. I have to cut it open with scissors and use a utensil to scrape out the last of the product--which is no small amount--trapped in the bottom crevices of the packet. It annoys me no end and I wouldn't purchase this brand again if my cat didn't love the gravy mix so much. (The typical B.F.F. canned food is too dense for her to eat.)
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: My Picky Cat LOVES This!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has tummy issues, so he needs a high quality food with a high moisture content. The problem is he doesn't like wet food (Weird, right?). I've tried multiple brands and after a few bites he's done. That changed when he tried Charm Me! He licked his plate clean! My other cat also loved this as well. This will be what they eat going forward!
customer_reviews.author: Maizey

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 12 years old and can not eat much dry food - finding new soft food that he likes the flavor of is getting difficult but he absolutely LOVES this food. The variety pack gives lots of options and I can get two meals out of each pouch. While it is a bit expensive the ingredients are quality and my little ball of fluff loves it and that's all that matters :) Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: WI Jen

customer_reviews.title: may have saved my cat's life.
customer_reviews.text: This terrific cat food may have saved my cat's life. Following a vet error & subsequent highly dangerous surgery, it was critical to induce my 8-yr. old cat to eat again. Of all the foods I could find, this is the only one she took to. I LOVE this product. It's pricey -- my cat food bill has tripled, but Splash the Wonder Cat is thriving ... and buying through Amazon is a little cheaper than local brick-and-mortar.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H. Stell

customer_reviews.title: None of my cats would eat this
customer_reviews.text: I saw the price on this assortment and ordered 2 boxes because one of the other Weruva products is gobbled my all of my cats...this one? My tom wouldn't eat it and my piglet cat, the one who eats everything and finishes her siblings food, actually tried to bury it...I'll stick to the other assortments I know they like... their favorite is Slap, Jack and Sal
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie's mom

customer_reviews.title: My Kitties LOVE this...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old kitties are finicky but they love this food. They slurp it up and wipe the bowl clean. It is a pain to clean the pouch out but I use a small spatula and rinse with water to get as much out as I can because it is a bit pricy and I don't want to miss a drop. I have also used the small cans but I find the pouches better value and less recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Watery mess. Annoying design.
customer_reviews.text: I got a variety pack. Food seems too mushy. So I paid for mostly water. Adding gravy is just a trick to reduce the amount of food without reducing weight of the portion. Not a fun of pouches. Hard to get food out of them. Sticky mess. Cat was not a so happy about the taste. Childish rainbow and heart design quickly became annoying. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: We have 1 older cat and 2 kittens they love this food. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: AA20400

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Purchase the Weruva cans. Your cats will like ot better it is better quality.
customer_reviews.text: The Weruva foil pouch cat food is not as high of quality in texture or smell and my cat will attest to the flavor not being as high of quality either because he threw up after eating a few licks of it. It's very mushy like applesauce texture. Way too expensive for such awful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brenlee

customer_reviews.title: Happy cats, happy owners
customer_reviews.text: The cats love all of the variety in these packs. They are not the most attractive meals once out of the pack, but usually cat food isn't. I do like that the food is more natural than most. You definitely see chunks of fish in the food. The food was first recommended at a speciality shop I had visited and found that the pricing on Amazon was much better. We will continue to order this good regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats did not lift their heads from their bowls, until the bowls were licked clean! They are usually picky eaters. Their stomachs have gotten sensitive with age, and I have had to buy ingredients to make their food from scratch. If they continue to enjoy this food and tolerate it well, I’ll be a customer FOR LIFE!
customer_reviews.author: Norrisp

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly kitties
customer_reviews.text: My elderly female has been a finicky eater of wet foods her entire life and i have tried many kinds of wet foods. i just accepted that this was her personality to eat like a bird. Last month she developed her first ever bladder infection which her vet told me was caused by her drinking more than she was eating. On a whim, i bought this wet food for her. Wonder of wonders, my cat eats this stuff with so much voracity one would think she was starving all her life. She REALY loves this brand and thats saying a lot!
customer_reviews.author: NinjaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: My Picky Senior Siamese is Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Siamese cat is a rescue with several teeth pulled out, so he needs to eat wet food or else he’s just swallowing dry food. I have tried several brands, and he’s a picky and spoiled eater. He has been eating this brand of food for over a year now and he loves it. He sometimes gets tired of other brands. Unfortunately for me, he loves the most expensive food. It’s worth it, though. He’s almost 14 years old and received a great ‘report card’ from the vet last week. I believe diet plays a large part.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality of this food. First, the package is hard to open and it's hard to get all the food out. The food is already watery and to get all of the food out you have to use a spoon or more water to get all the food from the package. These pouches are mush and gravy. The forth and fifth ingredients are sunflower oil and tapioca starch. I had to add kibble to the food because it was so wet. Will be returning, buy the canned food instead!!
customer_reviews.author: MBello

customer_reviews.title: Not the product you purchase in a store.
customer_reviews.text: These were not a slide out pancake like food with moisture. They are more like soup with a little cat food . I will give them to the feral cats and mix it with Frisks pate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not in my house, not for my cats :((
customer_reviews.text: All I can honestly say is my cats wouldn't eat it, Yuck, turned their noses up at it! Both of them, they are use to Fancy Feast, and I switch it up every now and then, they get salmon, tuna, chicken etc. But this was a No go for them, I gave tried other foods and they have eaten it, but not this...
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it . Changed formulation
customer_reviews.text: So basically my cat used to eat this stuff all the time . This time when i bought it makes her throw up everytime i gave her different wet food and noticed that everytime she eats from them she throws up !! Please do a quality check . my precious cat Is on a road to sickness everytime she eats this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: nazanin sal

customer_reviews.title: My cat enjoyed this.
customer_reviews.text: Like all the Weruva food we've tried, my cat enjoyed this as well. I didn't care for the packet because the food wouldn't just slide out and left chunks that I would have had to scrape out. The canned version was a bit easier to use. The food however, was popular with Figgy.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Schroedter

customer_reviews.title: Icky packaging
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. The packaging is not user friendly. Hard to open gets all over my hands and is messy. Would like to see package changed. It’s like soup
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitties LOVE this food
customer_reviews.text: My kitties LOVE this food. Every. Single. Flavor. And I love that it's good for them. My only complaint is that I'm not a fan of the packaging. It's difficult to get all of the food out of the pouches. Usually I either use a disposable spoon to scrape the food out that gets caught in the folds at the bottom, or put some water in the pouch and swish it around to release more bits.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: Worth the High Cost
customer_reviews.text: My long-hair male cat, Mattisse, loves this food in the pouch. It is expensive, but his health and luscious coat tell me that the expense is worth it. I worry about him getting enough moisture in his diet ~ this definitely helps. Because of the high cost of this food - I supplement his daily two pouches with Orijen dry. No cat food is worth the cost if a cat won't eat it. Mattisse comes running when I shake the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.  Smells awful.  Not a fan of the pouch vs. can.
customer_reviews.text: I really prefer cans over the pouches because with the pouches you've really got to get in there with a spoon to get all the food out from all the nooks and crannies. Soupier then I was expecting - and they smell awful - but my cats absolutely LOVE them. All the flavors - they lap this stuff down faster than any other wet food we've tried - and they lick the bowls clean. They aren't the pickiest eater and try most of the foods we try - but this is clearly their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: I switched from fancy feast broths to this product. This is a better value because you can feed two cats with one pouch compared to one pouch for each cat which comes out to the same amount. This brand also has better quality ingredients then fancy feast, with more variety of flavors. My cats enjoy this flavor along with all the flavors that come in the multipack !
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed in the product and the deceptive marketing
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in the product and the deceptive marketing. Apparently, BFF is produced in Thailand. How is the product regulated and tested to insure safety?
customer_reviews.author: Kemberley Noreiga

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cat, they will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my cat’s birthday, it came very late due to the pandemic but she LOVES it and the seller was so nice when I had issues finding the status of the shipment. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Cat gets his gravy fix
customer_reviews.text: I would get cans of extra gravy cat food. My cat would suck up the gravy and leave the chunks of food. This OMG cat food he absolutely loves. He eats it all up and yells at me when I haven't given him any yet. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: The Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Good and juicy
customer_reviews.text: Well, I did not taste this cat food but my cat did seem to enjoy it. It is very soupy, and to me it looks and smells like bloody fish guts. My senior cat licked all the juice, and ate some of the pieces but left a lot in the bowl after the soup was gone. I found it hard to get everything out of the envelope. I don't know if I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of my cats loooove this
customer_reviews.text: There is enough in one pouch to feed all 3 of my cats (albeit, I leave dry food out too). I give them this once every 2-3 days. I love how natural it is and is higher quality than food I eat 😂. I have a senior cat who is 14 and, due to chronic kidney issues needs extra fluids and I add a little water to it. She's a puker, but has never thrown this up. My other 2 kitties are between 1-2 yrs old and love it too. It's a winner and I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Forrester

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT FEED THIS TO YOUR CATS
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it negative stars. Tried 3 of the flavors, all smelt extremely bad but figured it was the blend of flavors. Then my cat started to try to bury it like poop and now has puked at least 10 times! If I have to take him to the vet or he gets any sicker I’ll be calling the company to LIGHT them up. Only good part of this was Amazon giving me an immediate refund but I HIGHLY suggest this product gets pulled before any other cats get sick. I feel bad even throwing this stuff in the trash cus the trash don’t even deserve to have to smell this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: kitties are happy
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, Sweetie and Misty. I inherited Sweetie when my dad died. When she eats regular cat food it just comes right back up. I've been trying different brands of pouch cat food for her. Misty gets the benefit of that. The shredded chicken doesn't get eaten, just the juice is lapped up. They eat the rest of it pretty good. This was the runner up of the 3 pouch brands I tried for them. That's going by the amount of food left in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: kim-berly

customer_reviews.title: Yummy new kitty food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my finicky cat who only likes to eat the gravy. I was pleasantly surprised when she ate the entire packet and wanted more. While there isn’t a lot of actual morsels of food in this packet, she would normally eat around us. However she did not. She ate the entire thing. Would highly recommend this food to other cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Mustalina

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and I thank them for making food for disabled cats. It’s hard to find a food that doesn’t require chopping up or teeth. My cat don’t got many teeth. It’s also very healthy and keeps his coat beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Check the box when you get it
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how to reach the seller of this product but one of my 12 pack box were short by 1. Kind of irritating and I'd like them to know - but again don't know how to contact the seller
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's more expensive than most common cat food. But its worth the price. It's the only thing my 18 year old cat will eat since he was diagnosed with end stage renal failure. He has gained some weight back and absolutely loves this food! I originally bought this from a local pet boutique and the price is a little less on Amazon. So glad I found this food!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved it
customer_reviews.text: At least there is some product in package some products don't have much in package, I have 8 cats, 4 of them just loved it, the other 4 not so much, but am just happy to have some of them like something, its hard to get cats to eat certain things. Will buy again, am trying different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: luvtohike

customer_reviews.title: My cat really loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well, she would eat anything 😂 but my Mom’s cat is a really picky eater and he actually likes it!
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: Generally one will like a food and the others won't
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food that all three of my cats will eat. It has tons of fresh meat chunks. Generally one will like a food and the others won't. Feeding three different foods was driving me crazy. So I was thrilled to find this food We've tried other flavors but this seems to be their favorite. I will warn you that the packaging is a pain to open and to dispense. It helps to squeeze and mix the contents before opening. The meat chunks get lodged at the bottom so mixing it up helps you get all of the good stuff out, easily. Definitely a life saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: My cat enjoys this 😻
customer_reviews.text: There are certain brands that give my cat an upset stomach, but she loves this one with no problems. I’ve been feeding her this for a few years now and she never gets tired of it either. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: danisaur

customer_reviews.title: Clean bowls and happy cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been eating this product for a year...when my local pet store didn’t have any on the self, I was relieved to find it here! I feel good feeding to my 3 cats and they look forward to it every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Only food senior cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: Finding a food that seniors will eat can be so frustrating. I bought this while I was taking care of a friend's cat, and Twinkie loved it. She would actually wait at her bowl for her dinner, which she hadn't done ever before. It has a perfect gravy texture that cats can just lick up, and obviously tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: but their other flavors and consistencies are enjoyed and don't have the "scraps" feel and look to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cats not fans of this flavor and I don't blame them. Weird chunks and fish skins. I know its for cats, but their other flavors and consistencies are enjoyed and don't have the "scraps" feel and look to them like these.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: My cat adores Wuerva.
customer_reviews.text: Smelly, messy, runny cat food. In other words, my cat LOVES it - more than Fancy Feast or other brands. Lots of juicy gravy/broth. He seems to like tuna and beef, which sounds disgusting to me. However, he’s my master and I’ll give him what he wants. I recommend starting with the “OhMyGravy!” mixed flavors to find their favorite. Thanks, Wuerva, for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. I have tired for years to get him off of fancy feast and he literally almost starved himself. I had tired them all and this was the last one and he loves it. He likes gravy but I also add some water to it . It’s a very clean healthy cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Madea

customer_reviews.title: Face deep in the bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my picky kitties love this stuff! The packets make feeding time convenient and quick. And they love all the different flavors. I've already ordered three boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My cat kids are so picky
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. 2 weeks in and my finicky, pain in the booty cats can't get enough of this food! Finally I can stop searching. If your cats are food snobs and love gravy this is the food for them. =^.^=
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Kitty likes these for a while but won’t touch anymore. The last shipment was not really gravy, more like wet pate. The cans are VERY hard to open. I cut my finger on the metal lid, incredibly sharp. The price is also outrageous for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pleasants

customer_reviews.title: CATS DONT LIKE THE SALMON BITS
customer_reviews.text: I have to pick all the salmon out before giving it to the cats. they will stop eating it if I miss one little piece ! Also, the packaging isn't user friendly, but this seems to be the new packaging system these days.
customer_reviews.author: ZenCats

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand and I am not crazy about the price. I am controlled by the cats!
customer_reviews.author: K. Svoboda

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, as described0 12 pouches, and it arrive today and in envelope with one pouch in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E. Peeler

customer_reviews.title: Cat wont eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat took a few licks and walked away. Now the out door cats will eat it I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ofcky Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I add water to my cats meal to help with their renal issues. At first they would refuse to eat their watered down food. I add a little of this to each bowl and it's thick gravy flavors the water. I also add crushed Actipet hairball tablets to mix with the water . Between these two I finally have something the cats will eat while still getting them the extra water they need.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is a super picky eater, so we've tried a whole bunch of different wet foods to no avail. I bought this brand on a whim around Christmas while it was on sale and, oh boy, do we have a winner! Since it is a bit pricey it's more of a treat, with her only getting a package every two days or so, but some days she absolutely (vocally) demands it! I've bought several different flavors, and she loves them all. There are 12 relatively small packages per box, the meat is in very small pieces almost minced, and it's the most gravy heavy food I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: My cats eats the whole pouch and loves all flavors
customer_reviews.text: My cat only likes fish, so this pack has all the variety plus fish and he loves every single flavor. It is the fist time he likes all packs the same way and eats the whole pouch. It is a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Caribay

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is the original Picky Eater -- but he loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: Remembering When

customer_reviews.title: Clean plate club
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very strong with this stuff, but out two cats love it. They clean the bowl and quickly. The only thing I am not crazy about is how far the odor drifts. Otherwise it’s a hit and my cats would be upset if we stopped ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H

customer_reviews.title: they love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this product. They sit at their bowl and mow for more when they get done. I wish I had a video they are so picky and finally found something. I wish I just had a jug to pour it out of though these packets are kind of cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: PoiZen EV

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!!.. but messy
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. I really want to like it but trying to open and squeeze it.out of this pouch at 6am while NOT getting wet, smelly cat food you is impossible and i have to say it really drives me crazy. The consistency is so thin that my cats seem to get it all over also but, I think thats why they like it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney "Mother of Plants" Smith

customer_reviews.title: I swear he looks almost relieved when he smells the pack open - like he knows he's about to feel better
customer_reviews.text: With his picky nature and tender stomach, this is the only thing my fur buddy can tolerate when he's not feeling well. More than tolerate - he loves it. I swear he looks almost relieved when he smells the pack open - like he knows he's about to feel better. Maybe I'm projecting, and it's just me who feels relieved, but anything that helps my guy get through those tough times and back on his way to feeling better is five stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for unwell cats w eating and hydration issues!
customer_reviews.text: Weruva is amazing at making tempting cat foods that are also very healthy. I got a variety of flavors and only one wasn’t a big hit with my I’ll cat who basically wouldn’t eat anything else at that point. Also, really easy to divide into two servings by scoring a crease in the middle of the packet before opening, you can fold it and keep it refrigerated for a second feeding.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bruen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of flavors to eliminate boredom. I like that there is no can to recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Spotty

customer_reviews.title: Love this food & free packaging recycling
customer_reviews.text: My kitties ADORE this wet food. It's full of lots of gravy which my veterinarian approves of. This brand also offers recycling of its packaging via Terracycle for free. Everybody's happy!
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: Different Quality Then Usual???
customer_reviews.text: This in normally a great product. It arrived soupy not just soft. Returned for a new pack and received wrong flavor. Turkey soup. My cats worse nightmare! Not meaty at all. Cant do anything else but throw it away. Get a refund the FIRST time and NOT a replacement!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wasz

customer_reviews.title: Why so many favorable review?
customer_reviews.text: This is awful stuff! I am not kidding you when I say it looks like vomit! Immediately I new it wasn't going to be a hit and it wasn't. Sooooo runny................what is up with that?
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: Well, there's no accounting for taste. I prefer the original line of Weruva which has chunks of meat you can actually tell what it is and it smells better. These are okay in easy to use pouches but not as good of quality for the price. But he gobbles this stuff up like there's no tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: jdsandara

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product that I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats. And often 3 cats have 3 different tastes. So to find a food that they will all eat...has been difficult. This one fits the bill. But a word of warning..once you start feeding it- there is no going back. My cats are addicted to this stuff! This is basically chunks of meat is a sauce. I use it as a topper for dry food. Because who would want to live a life with nothing but dry food:) Anyhow, this is a great product that I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

product_meta.title: Weruva B.F.F. OMG - Best Feline Friend Oh My Gravy! Grain-Free Natural Wet Cat Food Pouches, Original Tuna Recipes in Gravy
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Rainbow Á Gogo Variety Pack| Size:3-Ounce Pouch (Pack of 12)b.f.f., Best Friends Foods, Best Feline Friend or Best Friends Forever… Our foods are just that -- The best you can get for your furry little feline purr machine! With a high quality protein focus and limited carbohydrates, your kitty will enjoy BFF’s Grain Free, Low Fat recipes that also deliver the High Moisture your cat needs. If your cat is your BFF, then feed them the Best Feline Food! Super-Safe People Food Processing Standards - BFF is produced in a facility that also produces food for people. The factory operates at international human food processing standards, including that of the super-strict British Retail Consortium (BRC), and the pet food processing must pass BRC scrutiny. The Ingredients - The main ingredient is a red meat or dark meat from tuna, primarily skipjack or bonito, two smaller and highly sustainable species. The cuts contain lean muscle meat and have a taste and aroma that drives kitties wild! Amongst the various flavors, we include value added toppers such as boneless skinless chicken breast, duck, lamb, salmon, shrimp and pumpkin. Wild Caught and Dolphin Safe - And speaking of kitties going wild for BFF, all of the fish used is wild caught, with the exception of tilapia. The catches of fish are also certified to have been safe for dolphins and turtles, as certified by the ships’ captains. The Textures - Gravy and Aspic . BFF is available in cans and pouches, and all flavors deliver high moisture. The cans come in both gravy and aspic, and the pouches are all in gravy. The gravy is what you’d expect it to be…simply Cat-tastic for those kitties that love to lick! The aspic is similar to Jell-o in that it starts off as a powder that is mixed with water, but when cooked, it takes on a gel like substance. It is great for “protecting” the ingredients in that you are able to see and identify the ingredients that we use. The Family - BFF is made by Weruva and is still proud to be Family Owned & Operated by David & Stacie Forman after over 10 years of making high quality pet products! Your cat will love our BFF Grain-Free Formulas! BFF Variety Pack! Pouched Food features wild-caught, hand-flaked off the bone red-meat Skipjack Tuna with many delicious toppers that your BFF won't be able to resist. 

Guaranteed Analysis:
Pouch One (Tuna & Chicken – Charm Me): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05% Pouch Two (Tuna & Beef – Baby Cakes): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05% Pouch Three (Tuna & Salmon – Sweet Cheeks): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05% Pouch Four (Tuna & Lamb – Luv Yas): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05% Pouch Five (Tuna & Turkey – Tickles): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05% Pouch Six (Tuna & Duck – Devour Me): Crude Protein (min) 10.0%, Crude Fat (min) 1.4%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 86.0%, Ash (max) 2.0%, Taurine (min) 0.05%


AAFCO Statement:
This cat food is formulated to meet nutritional levels established by the AAFCO cat food nutrient profiles for adult maintenance.
feature_bullets: Rainbow A Gogo Variety Pack! (3oz Pouch, Pack of 12) OMG, Six different flavors in one variety pack! Featuring premium proteins like tuna, chicken, salmon, beef, lamb, and duck in a tasty gravy
Variety Pack includes 2 of each: Charm Me, Baby Cakes, Sweet Cheeks, Love Ya, Tickles, Devour Me
B.F.F. OMG - Your Best Feline Friend will love these extra juicy flavors. Oh my Gravy!
With even more gravy, and tender pieces of red meat tuna - B.F.F. provides all the lean protein and moisture your cat needs to thrive.
Grain-free, Gluten-free, & Carrageenan-free. No corn, wheat or soy. Free from any artificial colors & preservatives
Produced in Human Food Facilities under the Strictest B.R.C. Global Standards for Food
Weruva is a family company, wholly owned & operated by pet parent’s David & Stacie Forman
